tool.name: VCF region extraction

param.name: input_vcf
param.label: VCF file to extract region from

param.name: region
param.label: Type In region
param.help: The format of the region to be selected is chr:start-end

tool.help:
Region extraction selects a certain region from a vcf file
Samtools tabix is used to extract a region. http://samtools.sourceforge.net/tabix.shtml
